few_shot_examples.input: I can't breathe properly and have severe chest pain
High fever of 40Â°C for 2 days with severe headache and stiff neck
Mild sore throat for 1 day, no fever

variance_teaching.purpose: These examples teach the model to produce different urgency levels based on symptom severity
variance_teaching.expected_behavior: Model should map similar inputs to similar urgency levels but vary responses for different severity
